SEARCH
Package org.example.controller

Class FileController

java.lang.Object
org.example.controller.FileController
public class FileController extends Object

FileController.

The controller class for handling file operations in the application. this class has methods for writing and reading chaos game descriptions to and from files through file explorer.

Since:
0.3.0
Version:
1.0.0

    • FileController

      Constructor for the FileController class.
      Parameters:
      mainController - the main controller for the application. Used for switching between views.

  • Method Details

    • writeToFile

      public void writeToFile(ChaosGameDescription description)
      Writes a chaos game description to a file. The description is the current description.
      Parameters:
      description - the description to write to file.

    • readFromFile

      public ChaosGameDescription readFromFile()
      Reads a chaos game description from a file, and returns the description. If the file is not found, the method returns null.
      Returns:
      the chaos game description read from the file.

    • saveImageToFile

      public void saveImageToFile(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Method for saving an image to a file.
      Parameters:
      image - the image to save.
